abstract: BP said on Monday that it would sell its refinery in Texas City, Tex., and other assets to Marathon Petroleum for $2.5 billion, as BP neared the completion of an aggressive plan to pare back assets.
snippet: BP said on Monday that it would sell its refinery in Texas City, Tex., and other assets to Marathon Petroleum for $2.5 billion, as BP neared the completion of an aggressive plan to pare back assets.
lead_paragraph: BP said on Monday that it would sell its refinery in Texas City, Tex., and other assets to Marathon Petroleum for as much as $2.5 billion, as BP neared the completion of an aggressive plan to pare back assets.

headline.main: BP to Sell Texas City Refinery to Marathon Petroleum

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
